meanings.definition: A type of biscuit or cookie.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat keks with my tea in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: My mom baked delicious keks for the school bake sale.
meanings.sent3: The keks in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked keks filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The children happily munched on the sweet keks during the picnic.

meanings.definition: A slang term for laughing or amusement.
meanings.sent1: His joke was so funny that it made everyone burst into keks.
meanings.sent2: The comedy show had the audience in fits of keks.
meanings.sent3: The silly cat video never fails to bring keks to my day.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious laughter spread keks throughout the room.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's witty punchline elicited loud keks from the crowd.
